car_model: 2014 Mercedes Benz S Class S500 e Hybrid
reviewer_info: Posted by raja nasir on May 09, 2019
review_text: Interior is superb i would say its everything available in my car... from radar to autodoors from drive assist to auto parking... auto back support while you are driving on turns... auto brake if something came ahead of you... fuel consumption is bit high but when you buy such a expensive car u have to spend on fuel and maintenance of such a car... thanka
helpful_votes: (0 out of 0 people found this review helpful)

reviewer_info: Posted by faisal mukhtar on Aug 19, 2016
review_text: Exterior and interior are awsome as it's a Mercedes S class...The engine was 5471 therefore it uses fuel but it was never that expensive.  Overall the car is awsome and very versatile elegant. I bought this car from Japan and used it for 2 years never gave me a problem. There is a issue with SE class that it's right or left front pump has a manufacturer problem. It burst sometime and needs to be changed than.

car_model: Mercedes Benz S Class S500L LIM
reviewer_info: Posted by Nauman Majeed on Mar 24, 2012
review_text:
All M.B S-Series & CLS is the master pieces ever built by benz, focusing on innovation, style, comfort, safety & performance.

Hi its nauman, mechanical engineer & automobile lover, i am a fan of benz cars since 1988 when W124 (E200, 300 & 320 etc) was newly introduced in Lahore, now i am using S class & CLS here in Saudia, these are really very prestigious & reliable cars.
